T02D3672:284b-1: a'arya t'a r'ashta bha ya tra n'a ma s'a dha nam /
T02D3672:284b-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3672:284b-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3672:284b-5: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bdag po lhan cig skyes pa'i chos sku de bzhin du //
T02D3672:284b-6: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku ste padma'i 'dab ma bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan //
T02D3672:284b-7: rnal 'byor dag par rnam par thar gyur srid dang srid las bral ba'i sku gsung thugs chags pa //
T02D3672:284b-8: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med lha min mis mchod de la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D3672:284b-9: skye 'jig rnam par spangs phyir chos nyid mi 'gyur yang dag nyid du dbyer med kyang //
T02D3672:284b-10: 'khrul bcas 'gro ba'i don phyir sku gsungs thugs kyi phrin las khyad par gsang sngags lam //
T02D3672:284b-11: sgrib pa myur 'joms sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gzugs 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum //
T02D3672:285a-0: @285a * // 'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol ba 'di deng sgrub la dga' phyir dad pas brtsam par bya //
T02D3672:285a-1: dad ldan rab brtson dam tshig ldan //
T02D3672:285a-2: rje btsun sgrub la dga' ba yis //
T02D3672:285a-3: rnam par 'tshe med dben ba'i gnas //
T02D3672:285a-4: nyams dga' dngos grub 'byung gnas su //
T02D3672:285a-5: rten dang mchod rdzas sna tshogs pa //
T02D3672:285a-6: bshams nas bde ba'i stan nyid la //
T02D3672:285a-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul gyis //
T02D3672:285a-8: phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te //
T02D3672:285a-9: de nas rang gi snying ga ru //
T02D3672:285a-10: nga ro dang po las byung ba'i //
T02D3672:285a-11: chu shel dbus su yi ge ni //
T02D3672:285a-12: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la //
T02D3672:285a-13: lnga pa'i tha ma'i thig les brgyan //
T02D3672:285a-14: de yi 'od kyis rje btsun dang //
T02D3672:285a-15: 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams spyan drangs te //
T02D3672:285a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
T02D3672:285a-17: gti mug ldongs pa'i sems can gyi //
T02D3672:285a-18: ma rig mun pa sel mdzad ma //
T02D3672:285a-19: bde gshegs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3672:285a-20: dri zhim me tog thams cad dang //
T02D3672:285a-21: aa ga ru sogs bdug spos dang //
T02D3672:285a-22: rab tu mun sel sgron me dang //
T02D3672:285a-23: ga pur la sogs dri yi mchog / gtsang spyar bshos dang gzhan yang ni //
T02D3672:285a-24: sgra snyan la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02D3672:285a-25: thams cad dbul te sngags dang ni //
T02D3672:285a-26: phyag rgya'i rgyas kyang gdab par bya //
T02D3672:285a-27: 'khor ba thog ma med par du //
T02D3672:285a-28: sdig bgyis gang lags ma lus pa //
T02D3672:285a-29: da lta nyid du bshags bgyis nas //
T02D3672:285a-30: slan chad nam yang mi bgyid do //
T02D3672:285a-31: rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs 'phags rnams dang //
T02D3672:285a-32: 'gro ba kun gyi dge ba ni //
T02D3672:285a-33: zag med zag dang bcas pa la //
T02D3672:285a-34: bsam pas rje'i su yi rang ngo //
T02D3672:285a-35: 'gro mgon sprin bral nyi ma yi//
T02D3672:285a-36: dkyil 'khor rgyas par gyur rnams la //
T02D3672:285a-37: 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D3672:285a-38: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02D3672:285a-39: rgyal ba zag med dbyings nyid du //
T02D3672:285a-40: mya ngan 'das gzigs bzhed rnams la //
T02D3672:285a-41: ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi bar //
T02D3672:285a-42: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
T02D3672:285a-43: don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med //
T02D3672:285a-44: rnam par mi rtog chos sku las //
T02D3672:285a-45: gzugs sku lta bu'i tshul 'chang ba'i //
T02D3672:285a-46: 'gro mgon khyed la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3672:285a-47: ji ltar dus gsum mgon pa rnams //
T02D3672:285a-48: byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed ltar //
T02D3672:285a-49: bdag kyang 'gro rnams bsgom pa'i phyir //
T02D3672:285b-0: byang chub @285b mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02D3672:285b-1: phyag 'tshal la sogs bgyis pa las //
T02D3672:285b-2: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
T02D3672:285b-3: sems can lus sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D3672:285b-4: sa ni myar du thob par shog /'gro ba bde dang phrad la sogs //
T02D3672:285b-5: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
T02D3672:285b-6: de nas 'phags rnams gshegs byas la //
T02D3672:285b-7: brtan g-yo'i chos kun stong bar bsgom //
T02D3672:285b-8: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3672:285b-9: de nas chu skyes steng du ni //
T02D3672:285b-10: chu shel de steng sa bon no //
T02D3672:285b-11: de yongs gyur las autpa la //
T02D3672:285b-12: sa bon nyid kyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D3672:285b-13: de yi 'od kyis skye dgu rnams //
T02D3672:285b-14: sbyangs nas yongs gyur bcom ldan ma //
T02D3672:285b-15: zhal gcig phyag gnyis d'ur ba'i mdog / bcu drug na tshod rgyan rnams rdzogs //
T02D3672:285b-16: mchog sbyin pa dang autpa la //
T02D3672:285b-17: g-yas dang g-yon du shes bya ste //
T02D3672:285b-18: phyed krung gis bzhugs 'dzum pa'i bzhin //
T02D3672:285b-19: mtsho steng rin chen brag phrug nang //
T02D3672:285b-20: ltos 'gros zhabs brten bsgom par bya //
T02D3672:285b-21: g-yas dang g-yon gyi dang po ni //
T02D3672:285b-22: mam dang pram las lha mo ni //
T02D3672:285b-24: gser mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D3672:285b-25: rgyan mdzes g-yon na shing lo ni //
T02D3672:285b-26: mya ngan med dang rdo rje bsnams //
T02D3672:285b-28: g-yas kyi 'og mar phag gdong ma ;
T02D3672:285b-29: / p'a la sha mdog rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02D3672:285b-30: chos 'chad pa yi phyag rgya can //
T02D3672:285b-31: g-yon gyi 'og mar khro gnyer ma //
T02D3672:285b-32: mig sman mdog can khro mo'i tshul //
T02D3672:285b-33: gri gug thod khrag bsnams pa'o //
T02D3672:285b-34: de dag rnams kyi phyogs mtshams ni //
T02D3672:285b-35: brgyad na 'jigs pa rnam pa brgyad //
T02D3672:285b-36: bgegs dang dgra dang glang chen dang //
T02D3672:285b-37: me dang sbrul dang mi rgod dang //
T02D3672:285b-38: lcags sgrog gis bcings chu rnams las //
T02D3672:285b-39: skyob byed sgrol ma brgyad 'phro ba //
T02D3672:285b-40: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
T02D3672:285b-41: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las //
T02D3672:285b-43: snga ma'i tshul can spyan / drangs la //
T02D3672:285b-44: mchod nas yi ge bzhi po yis //
T02D3672:285b-45: gnyis su med par bstim par bya //
T02D3672:285b-46: yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du //
T02D3672:285b-47: byin gyis brlab bya de yi rjes //
T02D3672:285b-48: dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni //
T02D3672:285b-49: don yod grub pas spyi gtsug brgyan //
T02D3672:285b-50: de nas sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D3672:285b-51: 'od kyi spro bsdu cung zad bya //
T02D3672:286a-2: yi ge bcu pa bgrang bar bya //
T02D3672:286a-3: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3672:286a-4: 'bum phrag gsum mam yang na drug /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub //
T02D3672:286a-5: gal te 'byung po rnams la ni //
T02D3672:286a-6: gtor ma sbyin na snod gtsang du //
T02D3672:286a-7: zan blugs cho gas byin brlabs te //
T02D3672:286a-8: lag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las //
T02D3672:286a-9: mdzub gnyis gung mo gnyis po la //
T02D3672:286a-10: legs bcang ba ni autpa la //
T02D3672:286a-11: kha 'byed pa'i ni phyag rgya ste //
T02D3672:286a-12: gnas gsum dag tu gtugs byas nas //
T02D3672:286a-13: 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin //
T02D3672:286a-14: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3672:286a-15: las kyi yan lag thams cad ni //
T02D3672:286a-16: rgyas par rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir //
T02D3672:286a-17: 'di ru ma bkod de ru blta //
T02D3672:286a-18: rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis //
T02D3672:286a-19: 'di don nyams su len byed na //
T02D3672:286a-20: dngos dang dngos med zad gtso bo //
T02D3672:286a-21: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02D3672:286a-22: skye dang zag pa rnam spangs pa //
T02D3672:286a-23: dpal ldan yum nyid thob 'gyur te //
T02D3672:286a-24: bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub dang //
T02D3672:286a-25: gzhan yang gsad dang bskrad dang dbye //
T02D3672:286a-26: dgug dang zhi dang rgyas pa yi //
T02D3672:286a-28: de ltar stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid srid pa gsum skyes zad dngos shes dang ni //
T02D3672:286a-29: shes bya gnyis su med sku kun du bzang po spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum //
T02D3672:286a-30: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud bzhin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med //
T02D3672:286a-31: bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus
T02D3672:286a-32: rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob shog /'phags pa 'jigs
T02D3672:286a-33: pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i
T02D3672:286a-34: sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis mdzad
T02D3672:286a-36: / rgya gar byi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02D3672:286a-37: bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las //
T02D3672:286a-38: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' d'a na sh'i la dang /
